      • getCurrentCPULoad

        public CPUUsage getCurrentCPULoad()
        Description copied from interface: IHost
        If monitoring is enabled, gets the last measurement of the CPU load on this machine. Otherwise returns null.
        Returns:
        A complex value returning some basic load metrics of the CPU. Values are averages of the last 1-minute interval

      • getCurrentRAMUsage

        public RAMUsage getCurrentRAMUsage()
        Description copied from interface: IHost
        If monitoring is enabled, gets the last measurement of the memory usage on this machine. Otherwise returns null.
        Returns:
        A complex value containing the max, free and used memory of the host JVM process at measurement time.

      • serializeToMigrate

        public byte[] serializeToMigrate(UUID cloudObjectId)
                          throws JCloudScaleException
        Description copied from interface: IMigrationEnabledVirtualHost
        Prepares a cloud object for migration. After successful preparation the cloud object is serialized and returned to the caller as byte array.
        Parameters:
        cloudObjectId - The cloud object to prepare/migrate
        Returns:
        The serialized cloud object as byte array
        Throws:
        JCloudScaleException - If an error occurs during preparation and/or serialization

      • deployMigratedCloudObject

        public void deployMigratedCloudObject(UUID cloudObjectId,
                             Class<?> cloudObjectType,
                             byte[] serializedCloudObject,
                             Object proxy,
                             ReferenceQueue<Object> queue)
                               throws JCloudScaleException
        Description copied from interface: IMigrationEnabledVirtualHost
        Deploys a previously serialized cloud object. Deployment includes deserialization, initialization, preparation and registration of the cloud object's id at the cloud host
        Parameters:
        cloudObjectId - The id of the cloud object
        cloudObjectType - The implementation class of the cloud object
        serializedCloudObject - The serialized cloud object
        proxy - The cloud objects proxy object
        Throws:
        JCloudScaleException - If an error occurs during deployment

      • removeCloudObject

        public void removeCloudObject(UUID cloudObjectId)
                       throws JCloudScaleException
        Description copied from interface: IMigrationEnabledVirtualHost
        Destroys the remaining cloud object on the source host after a successful migration. This method is basically only a wrapper for #destroyCloudObject(String) to prevent ObjectLifecycleEventAspect from issuing a ObjectDestroyedEvent.
        Throws:
        JCloudScaleException

      • getCloudObjectSize

        public long getCloudObjectSize(UUID cloudObjectId)
        Description copied from interface: IMigrationEnabledVirtualHost
        Returns the size of the cloud object. The returned value is JVM-specific, thus only values calculated using the same JVM-implementation can be compared with each other.
        Parameters:
        cloudObjectId - The id of the cloud object, which size should be calculated
        Returns:
        The size
